title: Dawn of Eternal Day
description: Dawn’s life has fallen apart. Instead of going to college, she’s broke, unemployed, and single.When her best friend is kidnapped, she starts to wonder if she’s actually losing her mind. Was that a demon she saw at the crime scene? And why doesn’t anyone remember her friend?Homeless and desperate, Dawn finds herself depending on her mysterious neighbor. Turns out, he belongs to a secretive organization called The Academy of Light—along with four other dangerously sexy men. The Academy seeks to prove monsters are real—and she is now a member.With their protection, Dawn searches for her best friend. But powerful forces want to keep her apart from her guys. If she lets them, she could lose everything--including her life.**This is a reverse harem urban fantasy series. It is a companion series to Amber Lynn Natusch's Eve of Eternal Night .**
author: C.N. Crawford
